name: Onyx Private
headline: A modern and more accessible private bank for the new generation
description: Onyx is a modern, accessible private bank for the next generation of affluent young professionals. We offer a unified digital-native premium banking and wealth management experience tailored for the overlooked groups of young high-earners and illiquid entrepreneurs, investors, and tech employees. Onyx aims to be the next-generation UBS.

founders.name: Victor Santos
founders.description: Serial fintech entrepreneur. UC Berkeley graduate and ex-Googler recognized as a Forbes 30 Under 30 Social Entrepreneur and MIT Technology Review 35 Under 35 Innovator in LATAM for founding Airfox later renamed  banQi - a neobank unlocking more affordable financial services and accelerating financial inclusion to low-income Brazilian families.

founders.name: Douglas Lopes
founders.description: Doug spent time at Monitor Group, Bain & Co and large multinational companies in Brazil. Most recently, he helped grow Airfox / banQi to millions of users and assisted with the company’s acquisition. He is a MBA grad from MIT Sloan and Mechanical Engineer from USP in Brazil.

founders.name: Tiago Passinato
founders.description: Prior to Onyx, Tiago was the Principal Architect of Airfox / banQi, helping to implement a highly scalable banking platform. He has over 20 years of experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer, working for big companies in the US and Latin America.

ONYX FOR BANKS AND CREDIT UNIONS
# Modern digital-first private banking platform for your affluent customers
## Onyx helps you launch or augment your affluent services with a digital-first private banking super app with banking, investments, and wealth management seamlessly integrated into your infrastructure. 
[LET'S TALk![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525edac82429cf4dd70c1b8_Icone.svg)](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
![Hero for Banks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e09790fb23e27936f2_Group%201000001158.png)
![Line](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525ed5574270a9342a84979_div.line.webp)
## Augment or Launch your own digital private bank and wealth super app.
### White-label Onyx’s modern and accessible private banking super app without changing your core infrastructure. We enable a highly customizable experience and branding to tailor the experience to your needs.
[CONTACT US![Icon Arrow Rigth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525f45a82429cf4dd7983d8_Icone.svg)](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
![Digital Bank](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75de77e85d8f2f1ec90a_Frame%201171274475.png)
![Modern Digital Banking](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6526047a375f991210a3ff85_Money%2C%20Banknotes.svg)
Modern Digital Banking
Digital-first consumer and SMB accounts with digital onboarding experience, multiple virtual cards, joint accounts and authorized users built with bleeding edge anti-fraud and security tools.
![Personalized Investments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6526046e774d8856e93edeeb_Group.svg)
Investments Portfolios
Offer a personalized tax-loss harvesting robo-advisor, fixed-income money market accounts, T-Bills, and alternative investments such as PE, VC, and Hedge fund strategies with low fees and minimums. 
![Wealth Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6526057cfc226b18d33172e1_Group.svg)
Wealth Management
Offer an entry-level low-touch digital wealth management solution for net-worth tracking, with AI personal finance and investment management recommendations with a non-dedicated team of financial advisors. We can also integrate with your financial advisory team and existing infrastructure, or you can use our own.
![Marketing & Loyalty](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e6c05d5f974cc9feea9de_invoice-checkmark.svg)
Marketing & Loyalty
Offer scalable and low-cost attractive member-get-member referral programs and get access to our merchant-funded cash-back and member benefits partnerships.
![Line](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525ed5574270a9342a84979_div.line.webp)
## Modern digital Banking
### Digital-first and blazing-fast modern banking user experience with self-serve onboarding, multiplayer capabilities, native bill pay, embedded anti-fraud and security, and frictionless money movement.
[Let's talk![Icon Arrow Rigth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525f45a82429cf4dd7983d8_Icone.svg)](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
Consumer & Small Businesses Accounts
![Mobile & Web Apps](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75ddc3bd405fc084f5eb_Frame%201171274570.png)
Mobile & Web Apps
Modern UX, Multiple Virtual Accounts, ATM maps, financial analytics, real-timepush notifications, and smarttransaction search.
![Joint Account & Authorized Users](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75ddbeacacf6c295898f_Frame%201171274571.png)
Joint Account & Authorized Users
Multiplayer capabilities with different access levels and spend management.
![Digital onbording](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75de11732b501cf436b2_Frame%201171274572.png)
Digital onboarding
Embedded Anti-Fraud with Biometrics with seamless Digital KYC and KYB onboarding
![Security](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75df12711cf26a085412_Frame%201171274573.png)
Security and Anti-Fraud
Two-factor authentication, real-time selfie, and automated anti-fraud SDK for security
![Frictionless Money Movement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75df12711cf26a08540f_Frame%201171274574.png)
Frictionless Money Movement
Offer debit card funding, integrated payroll, seamless transfers between checking toinvestment accounts.
![Native Bill-Pay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75de79d575eda9fefd25_Frame%201171274575.png)
Native Bill-Pay
Allows users to seamlessly pull their student loans, mortgages, credit cards, and other utility payments, all from within the app, and initiate payments, one-time or recurring.
![Background Modern Digital](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75c4f49fad891f790c1d_fundo-de-dobras-onduladas-geometricas-abstratas%202.png)
![Line](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525ed5574270a9342a84979_div.line.webp)
## Investment Portfolios
### Offer diversified and personalized self-directed investment portfolios from Alternative Assets to Robo-advisory portfolios and Fixed income with low fees and minimums. Integrate with your existing infrastructure while enabling same-day money movement between investment and checking accounts. 
[Contact us![Icon Arrow Rigth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525f45a82429cf4dd7983d8_Icone.svg)](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
[![U.S Treasuries](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652d99c8643efcfe8d194f88_bank-building.svg)U.S TreasuriesState tax-exempt fixed-income product. Users can purchase with just 3 clicks. T-bills range from 1, 3, 6, and 12-month holding periods.](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![Robo Advisory](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652d99c55b332864d8931c1e_Graph%2C%20Google%2C%20Analitycs.svg)Robo AdvisoryOffer Tax-loss harvesting with direct Indexing and fractional investments of stocks, ETFs and bonds, arranged in a personalized portfolio based on your users’ risk profile.](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![Alternative Investments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652d99c5a9129a484ce08b47_Document%2C%20Content%2C%20Notes%2CPlanner.svg)Alternative InvestmentsPrivate Equity & Venture Capital Tier 1 and Tier 2 Global Funds at $10,000 minimums. Alpha hedge fund and volatility strategies based on mimicking Tier 1 hedge fund portfolios.](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![High Yield Cash Sweep Account](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652d99c5ede5a8287915c093_Group.svg)High Yield Money Market Account1-2 day liquidity low-risk fixed income high yield money market accounts](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![U.S Treasuries](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75c323e23cbe050811fe_U.S%20Treasuries.png)
![Robo Advisory](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e17573daa946e399c7_Robo%20Advisory.png)
![Alternative Investments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652ec4e6906d83daae32761c_Alternative%20Investments.png)
![High Yield Cash Sweep Account](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e17573daa946e399a0_High%20Yield%20Cash%20Sweep%20Account.png)
![U.S Treasuries](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652d99c8643efcfe8d194f88_bank-building.svg)
U.S Treasuries
5%+ High-Yield and Low-Risk in a easy way. Just 3 clicks directly from the app.
![U.S Treasuries](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75c323e23cbe050811fe_U.S%20Treasuries.png)
![Robo Advisory](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652d99c55b332864d8931c1e_Graph%2C%20Google%2C%20Analitycs.svg)
Robo Advisory
Tax Loss harvesting Robo-Advisory Personalized stocks and bonds.
![Robo Advisory](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e17573daa946e399c7_Robo%20Advisory.png)

Alternative Investments
Private Equity, Venture Capital (VC), and Hedge Funds are strategic investments for diversifying portfolios and low minimums.

4%+ in the idle money. High liquidity - 2 days clearing - and no minimums.
![High Yield Cash Sweep Account](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e17573daa946e399a0_High%20Yield%20Cash%20Sweep%20Account.png)

## Digital Wealth Management
### Offer a low-touch, self-directed wealth management solution for smaller account sizes powered by AI and a non-dedicated team of humans.
![Wealth Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e08873b20a0655f2ae_Frame%201171274580.png)
Digital Wealth Features
![Digital Wealth Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528b84f9c340083798e3e27_investment-add-plus.svg)![Digital Wealth Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528b81f7f404ba1fd375ee7_Group.svg)
Personalized Finance Recommendation
  * Receive automated personalized recommendations based on information gathered from net-worth tracker and self-input data.


![Digital Wealth Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528bc1bd496beba9b60394a_Messages%2C%20Chat.svg)![Digital Wealth Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528bbe1fec11464e7b33c8d_Messages%2C%20Chat.svg)
Net Worth Tracker
  * Users can connect their assets and liabilities for a unified, integrated view. Connect external accounts from private market investments to other banks, brokerage accounts, and mortgages, credit cards.


![Digital Wealth Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528bcb1d832aae1bfbae901_coins-document-chart.svg)![Digital Wealth Features](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528bccd5ec19109e241921f_coins-document-chart.svg)
Digital Financial Advisor
  * Provide users with a recommended and automated personal financial plan and investment management recommendation while providing a low-touch, non-dedicated team for additional questions. We integrate with your existing team.


![BG Wealth Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e7fbfc8637a634c6cd721_Frame%201171274472.png)
![Grow your business with our loyalty program](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/652e75e025bc3da3332181f4_Frame%201171274577.png)![Grow your business with our loyalty program](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6528b03ef72a91e09ecab71b_Frame%201171274577.webp)
![Line](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64001a240b4a44cd8693ca07/6525ed5574270a9342a84979_div.line.webp)

  1. Referral Engine
  2. Self-Funded and Merchant funded Cash-back Engine

ONYX FOR BANKS AND CREDIT UNIONS
# Modern digital-first private banking platform for your affluent customers
## Onyx helps you launch or augment your affluent services with a digital-first private banking super app with banking, investments, and wealth management seamlessly integrated into your infrastructure. 
LET'S TALk![⟨13⟩](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
![Hero for Banks⟨14⟩]
![Line⟨12⟩]
## Augment or Launch your own digital private bank and wealth super app.
### White-label Onyx’s modern and accessible private banking super app without changing your core infrastructure. We enable a highly customizable experience and branding to tailor the experience to your needs.
CONTACT US![Icon Arrow Rigth⟨15⟩](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
![Digital Bank⟨16⟩]
![Modern Digital Banking⟨17⟩]
Modern Digital Banking
Digital-first consumer and SMB accounts with digital onboarding experience, multiple virtual cards, joint accounts and authorized users built with bleeding edge anti-fraud and security tools.
![Personalized Investments⟨18⟩]
Investments Portfolios
Offer a personalized tax-loss harvesting robo-advisor, fixed-income money market accounts, T-Bills, and alternative investments such as PE, VC, and Hedge fund strategies with low fees and minimums. 
![Wealth Management⟨19⟩]
Wealth Management
Offer an entry-level low-touch digital wealth management solution for net-worth tracking, with AI personal finance and investment management recommendations with a non-dedicated team of financial advisors. We can also integrate with your financial advisory team and existing infrastructure, or you can use our own.
![Marketing & Loyalty⟨20⟩]
Marketing & Loyalty
Offer scalable and low-cost attractive member-get-member referral programs and get access to our merchant-funded cash-back and member benefits partnerships.
![Line⟨12⟩]
## Modern digital Banking
### Digital-first and blazing-fast modern banking user experience with self-serve onboarding, multiplayer capabilities, native bill pay, embedded anti-fraud and security, and frictionless money movement.
Let's talk![Icon Arrow Rigth⟨15⟩](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
Consumer & Small Businesses Accounts
![Mobile & Web Apps⟨21⟩]
Mobile & Web Apps
Modern UX, Multiple Virtual Accounts, ATM maps, financial analytics, real-timepush notifications, and smarttransaction search.
![Joint Account & Authorized Users⟨22⟩]
Joint Account & Authorized Users
Multiplayer capabilities with different access levels and spend management.
![Digital onbording⟨23⟩]
Digital onboarding
Embedded Anti-Fraud with Biometrics with seamless Digital KYC and KYB onboarding
![Security⟨24⟩]
Security and Anti-Fraud
Two-factor authentication, real-time selfie, and automated anti-fraud SDK for security
![Frictionless Money Movement⟨25⟩]
Frictionless Money Movement
Offer debit card funding, integrated payroll, seamless transfers between checking toinvestment accounts.
![Native Bill-Pay⟨26⟩]
Native Bill-Pay
Allows users to seamlessly pull their student loans, mortgages, credit cards, and other utility payments, all from within the app, and initiate payments, one-time or recurring.
![Background Modern Digital⟨27⟩]
![Line⟨12⟩]
## Investment Portfolios
### Offer diversified and personalized self-directed investment portfolios from Alternative Assets to Robo-advisory portfolios and Fixed income with low fees and minimums. Integrate with your existing infrastructure while enabling same-day money movement between investment and checking accounts. 
Contact us![Icon Arrow Rigth⟨15⟩](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#contact>)
![U.S Treasuries⟨28⟩U.S TreasuriesState tax-exempt fixed-income product. Users can purchase with just 3 clicks. T-bills range from 1, 3, 6, and 12-month holding periods.](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)![Robo Advisory⟨29⟩Robo AdvisoryOffer Tax-loss harvesting with direct Indexing and fractional investments of stocks, ETFs and bonds, arranged in a personalized portfolio based on your users’ risk profile.](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)![Alternative Investments⟨30⟩Alternative InvestmentsPrivate Equity & Venture Capital Tier 1 and Tier 2 Global Funds at $10,000 minimums. Alpha hedge fund and volatility strategies based on mimicking Tier 1 hedge fund portfolios.](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)![High Yield Cash Sweep Account⟨31⟩High Yield Money Market Account1-2 day liquidity low-risk fixed income high yield money market accounts](https://www.onyxprivate.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)

![Robo Advisory⟨33⟩]

U.S Treasuries
5%+ High-Yield and Low-Risk in a easy way. Just 3 clicks directly from the app.
![U.S Treasuries⟨32⟩]
![Robo Advisory⟨29⟩]
Robo Advisory
Tax Loss harvesting Robo-Advisory Personalized stocks and bonds.
![Robo Advisory⟨33⟩]

Alternative Investments
Private Equity, Venture Capital (VC), and Hedge Funds are strategic investments for diversifying portfolios and low minimums.
![Alternative Investments⟨34⟩]

High Yield Cash Sweep Account
4%+ in the idle money. High liquidity - 2 days clearing - and no minimums.

## Digital Wealth Management
### Offer a low-touch, self-directed wealth management solution for smaller account sizes powered by AI and a non-dedicated team of humans.
![Wealth Management⟨36⟩]
Digital Wealth Features
![Digital Wealth Features⟨37⟩]![Digital Wealth Features⟨38⟩]
Personalized Finance Recommendation
  * Receive automated personalized recommendations based on information gathered from net-worth tracker and self-input data.


![Digital Wealth Features⟨39⟩]![Digital Wealth Features⟨40⟩]
Net Worth Tracker
  * Users can connect their assets and liabilities for a unified, integrated view. Connect external accounts from private market investments to other banks, brokerage accounts, and mortgages, credit cards.


![Digital Wealth Features⟨41⟩]![Digital Wealth Features⟨42⟩]
Digital Financial Advisor
  * Provide users with a recommended and automated personal financial plan and investment management recommendation while providing a low-touch, non-dedicated team for additional questions. We integrate with your existing team.


![BG Wealth Management⟨43⟩]
![Grow your business with our loyalty program⟨44⟩]![Grow your business with our loyalty program⟨45⟩]

generated_description:
Onyx Private is a Miami-based fintech startup launched in 2021, born out of Y Combinator's Batch W22. They are on a mission to redefine private banking, making it more modern and accessible for the next generation—specifically targeting affluent young professionals, overlooked high-earners, and illiquid entrepreneurs.

This innovative private bank positions itself as the next-generation UBS, merging a premium banking experience with a digital-native approach. Onyx offers a suite of services that includes digital banking, investment portfolios, and wealth management designed to cater to individuals often sidelined by traditional banking experiences.

Their platform supports not only individual consumers but also small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Onyx’s offerings come equipped with features like seamless digital onboarding, multiple virtual accounts, and advanced security measures. Their investment services incorporate robo-advisory features with low fees and personalized tax-loss harvesting options, as well as access to diverse asset classes, including private equity and venture capital strategies.

Onyx is also focused on partnerships with banks and credit unions, offering a white-labeled solution that allows financial institutions to integrate modern private banking capabilities without overhauling their existing infrastructure.

With a small but focused team of ten, including their group partner, nan, Onyx is making waves in a space that desperately needs disruption. As they gear up for appearances at events like Money20/20 USA, they invite financial institutions and potential clients to explore their offerings.

If you're curious to learn more or to see how Onyx fits within the modern banking landscape, their website is a treasure trove of information: [Onyx Private](https://www.onyxprivate.com).
